ai-mil3.1.14:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, what is the mark of a dragon?”
ai-mil3.1.14:1.3_0: “Great king, all skillful qualities lead to immersion. Concentration is their concentration.”
ai-mil3.1.14:2.2_0: “Great king, the rafters of a bungalow all lean to the peak, slope to the peak, and meet at the peak, so the peak is said to be the topmost of them all.
ai-mil3.1.14:2.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are found in the presence of immersion.”
ai-mil3.1.14:3.2_0: “Now, great king, anyone might prepare with the army of four divisions of elephants, horses, chariots, and infantry, and chariots might well carry off with their hands.
ai-mil3.1.14:3.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are found in the presence of immersion. They slant, slope, and incline towards immersion.
